article_text:
Kankakee, IL (60901)

Today

Cloudy early with scattered thunderstorms developing this afternoon. High near 85F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%..

Tonight

Scattered thunderstorms. Low 67F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

article_metadata.author: Mary Lu LaffeySmall Newspaper Group

og.description: When President Theodore Roosevelt visited the Grand Canyon in 1903, he asked our ancestors to keep it for their children, their children's children — which would be us — and
og.title: Grand Canyon National Park
